title: Should I just quit this game and call it a day?
body:
I'm getting sick of dealing with these servers considering I do NOT hate League of Legends but what I do hate is getting constant lag spikes in matches but at an unconsistent pace to where I can't predict if one match I may have lag spikes or not.

Meanwhile I just played a DOTA 2 match and had zero lag, like there were a FEW stutters of lag here and there, but overall, there was no lag to be seen.

I just don't see how I can enjoy playing this game any longer when these servers keep screwing up my matches and I keep ruining people's games since I can't do anything by lagging, as in a ranked match as Vladimir I literally froze still and couldn't get out of the client for a whole 6 minutes so we ended up losing, that's just not good for me to be ruining people's hard work of climbing the ladder, including me, considering I've been trying pretty hard to climb the ladder and this lag, holy shit does it get me at bad times.

I mean what do you guys think? Do I quit League of Legends and play DOTA 2 since I have no lag there and deal with the fact I don't like DOTA 2 as much as League of Legends or do I stay here and hope these servers get better?
